titles.title: A bill to establish the World War I Centennial Commission to ensure a suitable observance of the centennial of World War I, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/22/2008--Introduced. Establishes the World War I Centennial Commission to: (1) plan, develop, and execute programs, projects, and activities to commemorate the centennial of World War I; (2) encourage private organizations and state and local governments to organize and participate in such activities; (3) facilitate and coordinate such activities throughout the United States; and (4) serve as a clearinghouse for the collection and dissemination of information about centennial events and plans; and (5) develop commemoration recommendations for Congress and the President.
